===示例===
{{example|lang=cpp|1=
|
|code=
#include &lt;fstream&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

int main()
{
    const char* fname = "unique_name.txt";
    
    // 写入临时流对象
    std::fstream(fname, std::ios::out {{!}} std::ios::trunc) &lt;&lt; "Hi";
    
    std::string s;
    std::fstream(fname, std::ios::in) &gt;&gt; s;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Hi
}}
